headline: Workday to Cut About 1,750 Jobs
summary: By Don Nico Forbes Workday outlined a restructuring plan which will result in a reduction of about 1,750 jobs, or 8.5% of its current workforce. The human-resources software company said...

headline: Workday to cut 8.5% of its workforce
summary: Payroll processing company Workdaysaid on Wednesday it will cut around 1,750 jobs, or8.5% of its current workforce, as it grapples with competitionand an uncertain spending environment. ...
